ComicInfo.Title: Terra Incognita, Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary: Terra Incognita, Conclusion: Monica Rappaccini betrays both Banner and her daughter, which makes the Hulk and Scorpion natural allies to go up against AIM. The Hulk wins, putting Banner back in charge of Australia, and Magneto makes one last attempt to regain control.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-18 01:25:47. [CVDB117039] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:59:04. [Issue ID 240834]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Carlos Lopez,William Murai,Carlos Lopez,William Muray,Impacto Studio
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Monica Rappaccini,A.I.M.,Dr. Isaacs,Hulk [Bruce Banner],Jonny,Adam,Magneto,Scorpion [Thanasee Rappaccini],Dr. Lazlo (dies)
ComicInfo.AgeRating: T+ Suggested for Teens and Up
